documentation.title: Accessibility Documentation
documentation.subtitle: Complete guide to accessibility features in our app suite

getStarted.title: Getting Started
getStarted.text: Welcome to our collection of accessible applications! Each app in this suite has been carefully designed with accessibility in mind, ensuring that everyone can enjoy and interact with the content regardless of their abilities or the assistive technologies they use.

use.keyboard: Keyboard Users: Tab through interactive elements, use Enter/Space to activate
use.screenReader: Screen Reader Users: Each app provides live updates and clear labeling
use.mobile: Mobile Users: All apps are touch-friendly and responsive

calculator.title: üßÆ Calculator
calculator.description: A fully accessible calculator with visual and auditory feedback. Features a ticker-tape style history that keeps track of your calculations.

features.keyboard: Full keyboard support for all operations

accessibilityFeatures.keyboard: Keyboard Support: Full keyboard navigation support
accessibilityFeatures.visual: Visual Feedback: Clear focus indicators and button states

rainbowGenerator.title: üåà Rainbow Generator
rainbowGenerator.description: An interactive visual experience that creates bouncing rainbow animations. This app showcases accessible interactive graphics and animation controls.

features.click: Click or tap to create bouncing rainbows
features.auto: Auto-generation mode for continuous rainbow creation

accessibilityFeatures.keyboard: Keyboard Access: Space/Enter keys create rainbows
accessibilityFeatures.controls: Alternative Controls: Button controls for users who can't use mouse
accessibilityFeatures.status: Status Updates: Live count of active rainbows
accessibilityFeatures.motion: Motion Control: Clear start/stop controls for auto-generation

solitaire.title: üÉè Solitaire
solitaire.description: A classic Klondike Solitaire implementation with full accessibility support. This complex card game demonstrates accessible drag-and-drop alternatives and game state management.

accessibilityFeatures.clear: Clear Visual Feedback: Selected cards and valid moves highlighted
accessibilityFeatures.state: Game State Announcements: Move confirmations and game status
accessibilityFeatures.keyboard: Keyboard Support: Full game playable with keyboard only

arcade.title: üïπÔ∏è Arcade Game
arcade.description: A classic Snake game implementation with comprehensive accessibility features. Demonstrates how fast-paced games can be made accessible.

accessibilityFeatures.keyboard: Keyboard Controls: Arrow keys and WASD for movement
accessibilityFeatures.status: Status Updates: Score and game state announcements
accessibilityFeatures.pause: Pause Control: Space bar to pause/resume
